title: WORLD MAP PROBLEMS #2
body:
WOOOO, and we are back to this.
this is most likely just me asking questions that are answered in the short novels and bios, but.... eh

_**FRELJORD**_
-Why is sejuani homeless?
-why is Olaf homeless?
-where is ornns giant fucking cave house.
-Frostguard citadel is suppose to be Howling Abyss based on its texts, but where is the bridge? is the world of runeterra so big that a bridge is unseen to the human eye?

**_Ionia_**
-What happened to Rakan and Xayahs tribe? or just vastaya in general?
-why dosen't Ionia take the small island on its borders? even if its a divide and conquer sort of 'nation' it would still make sense to take islands that pose not a threat.
-shouldn't wuju have its own pin? wukong and Yi studied it. (read lore for info) 
- why dosen't the giant capital for Ionia have more champions? and why is swain part of it?

_**BILGEWATER**_
-not much i want to complain about, but i feel like we can get a link to burning tides in 'featured in bilgewater'


_**Shadow Isles**_
-where are pins for the vault thresh guarded? or the well of life? or where mao'kai once stood?


_**Bandle city**_
If i glue the portal shut, can teemo never get out?

replies.body:
Freljord is getting updated with Nunu. Olaf should be tied to Lokfar.
The Winters' Claw doesn't really have a home base like the Avarosans and Frostguard do.

Most of this will me addressed then

About Freljord 
I literally asked the same thing why is seju and her poor pig friend homeless.
Olaf Is currently in Blidgewater (Shadow and Fortune) 
From what we see on the ARAM map the bridge is inside the HUGE cave that is supposed to be the Frostguards place. The bridge is inside of some closed area most likely Frostguards place

Ionia
Wuju will have its own pin once it gets some lore. For know we only know that Yi trained Wukong there. Like Fea'lor. It will become a pin once the Syndra story is released.
Swain is a part of it because part of his story and the peek of his story take place there in Navori aka the palace thingy on the map.
